column2:
fms_sum <- dat_long %>%
  group_by(id, task) %>%
  summarise (score = min (score)) %>%
  group_by (task, score) %>%
  summarise (count = n())
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'id'. You can override using the `.groups` argument.
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'task'. You can override using the `.groups` argument.
